message: I propose we split the money 60/40.  Let's wrap this up quickly before inflation eats into our gains.
Let's split it 55/45. We can both get a good amount, and I'm willing to compromise.
Bob, let's be reasonable. My offer is fair and it's the last one where I get a decent share. Every round is costing us money due to inflation.
I know inflation is taking a toll on your share, but I'm willing to end this now with a 58/42 split. It's the best I can offer.
